long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enhances the user experience on the OLX website by providing additional functionalities. The main purpose of the extension is to analyze listings, detect duplicates, and evaluate prices.

Key Features:
Duplicate Detection:

The extension scans OLX listings to identify duplicates and informs the user about any found duplicates.
Price Evaluation:

It evaluates the prices of listings, categorizing them as "Very Good," "Good," "Average," etc., and displays this information on the page.
Interactive Modals:

It creates interactive modal windows that show detailed information about duplicate listings and other relevant data.
Backend Integration:

The extension sends data from OLX pages to a backend server and updates the page based on the server's responses, ensuring up-to-date information.
Page Load Handling:

It detects when the page is fully loaded and then executes necessary scripts to enhance user experience.
This extension makes it easier for OLX users to manage listings, find the best prices, and overall improves the browsing experience on the OLX website.
